meanings.definition: The act of skiing on grass or turf.
meanings.sent1: Turfskiings can be a fun way to enjoy the outdoors during the summer.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of people engaging in turfskiings at the park.
meanings.sent3: The sight of turfskiings in the middle of a field made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful turfskiings down the hill resembled a dance on grass.
meanings.sent5: The sound of turfskiings echoed through the meadow, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The equipment used for skiing on grass or turf.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to check your turfskiings for any damages before heading out.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of turfskiings for sale, catering to different preferences.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the turfskiings on his back, he looked like a walking sports shop.
meanings.sent4: The shiny new turfskiings gleamed under the sun, ready for their first use.
meanings.sent5: She carefully packed her turfskiings, excited for the upcoming adventure on grassy slopes.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of skiing on grass or turf.
meanings.sent1: Turfskiings requires a different technique compared to traditional skiing on snow.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the thrill of turfskiings as a summer pastime.
meanings.sent3: Competing in turfskiings events always brings out the competitive spirit in me.
meanings.sent4: The community came together to celebrate the annual turfskiings competition.
meanings.sent5: His passion for turfskiings was evident in the way he spoke about it with enthusiasm.
